content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings, Hassan. It's always a pleasure to meet new tenants. Can you provide me with your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 1000 Euros, but I am willing to negotiate. Can you provide me with a rental price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Hassan. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would estimate the rental price to be around 1200 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating and would be willing to consider lowering the price if you are able to provide a longer lease term or if you are able to pay a security deposit. What are your thoughts on these terms?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay a security deposit and I can sign for a long-term lease of 1 year. How about 1100 Euros per month?

I agree to the price of 1100 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Excellent, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and sign a long-term lease. I am happy to agree to a rental price of 1100 Euros per month for this apartment. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns before we finalize the lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
